items.title: The Power of Humility
items.headline: Humble Thyself - Humility enhances personal and spiritual lives. Learn how humility catapults you to greatness.
objectives_summary: Recognize pride within yoursef, then eliminate it.
Learn that humility does not mean you're quiet and neither does pride mean you're loud.
Learn that strength is in humility, but weakness is in pride.
